birthdayboy.description: It wasn't surprising that Milo had a happy birthday.  All his days are pretty happy.
birthdayboy.title: Birthdayboy

birthdayboy2.description: Milo's present to himself:  a serious attempt to put crawling behind him.   He didn't walk everywhere, but he definitely gave notice that crawling is officially passé.
birthdayboy2.title: Birthdayboy 2

nana.description: Between going to South Africa and buying a house, Nana made time in her busy schedule to come visit.
nana.title: Nana

party_1.description: Artistic balloon shot courtesy of Amanda Joyce, who is becoming quite an accomplished photographer.
party_1.title: Party 1

party_balloon1.description: Balloons these days are getting fancier.
party_balloon1.title: Party Balloon 1

party_balloon2.description: This one survived everything in Milo's arsenal.
party_balloon2.title: Party Balloon 2

party_balloon3.description: Austin and Felix combat the helium-filled Tyrannosaurus.
party_balloon3.title: Party Balloon 3

party_cadeaux.description:
Milo immediately understood the concept presents, and approved.
Photo by Amanda Joyce
party_cadeaux.title: Party Cadeaux

party_cadeaux2.description: Proudly showing off a new acquisition.  Of course, 80% of the time he was more fascinated by the wrapping than the toy.
party_cadeaux2.title: Party Cadeaux 2

party_cadeaux3.description: Milo was happy to see Maria, his nanny.
party_cadeaux3.title: Party Cadeaux 3

party_cake1.description:
One baby, one year, one candle.
Photo by Amanda Joyce
party_cake1.title: Party Cake 1

party_cake2.description: Dean gets a depressingly cake-obscuring 32 candles.
party_cake2.title: Party Cake 2

party_hack1.description:
Dean shows the guys how to break a leg playing hackey sack.
Photo by Amanda Joyce
party_hack1.title: Party Hack 1

party_hack2.description:
Terry has his own methods of breaking body parts.
Photo by Amanda Joyce
party_hack2.title: Party Hack 2

party_hack3.description:
Sometimes Terry can even break parts on two different bodies.
Photo by Amanda Joyce
party_hack3.title: Party Hack 3

party_sad.description:
Milo's not always sweetness and light. He'll take a spill, or wake up crying, or (new this week) throw a fit if we stop him from doing something he really wants to do.
Photo by Amanda Joyce
party_sad.title: Party Sad

space1.description: Felix and Dean are way into space right now.  The Space Shuttle and the moon landings are the two big ones they talk about.  Here, they act out the Apollo lunar lander rendezvouzing with the Earth re-entry vehicle.
space1.title: Space 1

space2.description: Nana took Felix to the Chabot space museum, where it started to sink in that the Apollo moon missions really were real.
space2.title: Space 2

space3.description: Quarantine that cosmonaut on account of excessive cuteness!
space3.title: Space 3

space4.description:
Felix shows Keenan Dean's birthday present: a robot that transforms into a plane. Lucie found the original transformer toy from 1982, that started the whole genre.
Photo by Amanda Joyce
space4.title: Space 4

yoga1.description:
Yoga Mom Clara with daughter Saia, a July 23 baby. This marks a year that the Yoga Moms have been hanging out together.
Photo by Jen Molander
yoga1.title: Yoga 1

yoga2.description:
Felix relaxes on the grass.
Photo by Jen Molander
yoga2.title: Yoga 2

description:
Milo and Dean's odometers both turned over this week. Milo's still basically fresh off the dealer's lot, with that new baby smell (ugh). Dean, however, can't claim low low miles. He'll have to settle for "well maintained".

New word: bye bye. Accompanied by a cute wave.

Felix's honeymoon with his new school is over. He says he loves his teachers but doesn't have any friends. He does play with kids, especially Jules -- but none are close like Jasper and Torin were at his old school. These things take time, but try explaining that to a 3½ year old.
title: July 24
